data.lyric:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:Diplo/Julia Michaels/Morgan Wallen]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heartless (Explicit) - Diplo/Julia Michaels/Morgan Wallen
[00:00.48]Lyrics by：Thomas Wesley Pentz/Morgan Wallen/Henry Agincourt Allen/Ernest Keith Smith/Ryan Hurd/Ryan "Charlie Handsome" Vojtesak
[00:00.96]Composed by：Thomas Wesley Pentz/Morgan Wallen/Henry Agincourt Allen/Ernest Keith Smith/Ryan Hurd/Ryan "Charlie Handsome" Vojtesak
[00:01.45]Heartless heartless heartless
[00:05.21]So heartless so heartless so heartless
[00:09.44]Say you're going out late
[00:11.52]I count down till you call me
[00:13.70]It's just one of those things
[00:15.98]That you do when you're lonely
[00:18.08]And you're all about the chase
[00:20.13]But you won't ever let me catch you
[00:22.43]And I wish I was the same
[00:24.53]But I know I'm gunna let you in again and when I do
[00:27.83]Its gunna hurt like hell and you don't mean to
[00:31.14]That's what I tell myself
[00:33.01]But why you gotta be so heartless
[00:35.40]I know you think it's harmless
[00:37.61]You're tearing me apart
[00:39.21]And girl the hardest part is
[00:41.92]You're so high on attention
[00:44.38]Taking miles from inches
[00:46.54]Leave me in the darkness
[00:48.16]Never finish what we started
[00:50.46]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[00:52.88]So heartless
[00:55.12]Why you gotta be so heartless
[00:57.36]So heartless
[01:00.45]Monday night was definitely not our night
[01:02.83]Tuesday night was just another fight
[01:04.96]Wednesday I thought everything would change
[01:07.01]Thursday came and it was still the same
[01:09.27]Friday night we went out on the town
[01:11.39]Saturday we should have burned it down
[01:13.60]Sunday morning came and now you're gone
[01:15.64]I should probably know this s**t by now
[01:17.93]Ah ohh
[01:20.05]I should probably know this s**t by now
[01:21.89]But no no
[01:25.41]Why you gotta be so heartless
[01:27.29]I know you think it's harmless
[01:29.46]You're tearing me apart
[01:31.19]And girl the hardest part is
[01:33.86]You're so high on attention
[01:36.26]Taking miles from inches
[01:38.42]Leave me in the darkness
[01:40.09]Never finish what we started
[01:42.55]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[01:44.99]So heartless
[01:46.97]Why you gotta be so heartless
[01:49.27]So heartless
[01:51.09]Girl why you gotta be so in between
[01:54.41]Loving me and leaving leaving
[02:00.80]Ah ohh
[02:03.26]I should probably know this s**t by now
[02:05.20]But no no
[02:08.59]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:10.52]I know you think it's harmless
[02:12.71]You're tearing me apart
[02:14.39]And girl the hardest part is
[02:16.98]You're so high on attention
[02:19.47]Taking miles from inches
[02:21.55]Leave me in the darkness
[02:23.27]Never finish what we started
[02:25.70]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[02:28.20]So heartless
[02:30.31]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:32.58]So heartless
[02:34.59]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:36.98]So heartless
[02:38.68]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[02:40.84]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
data.trans:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:Diplo/Julia Michaels/Morgan Wallen]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.48]//
[00:00.96]//
[00:01.45]无情
[00:05.21]好无情
[00:09.44]你说出门晚了
[00:11.52]我焦急等待你给我打电话
[00:13.70]这就是你孤独时
[00:15.98]喜欢做的事
[00:18.08]你总喜欢你追我赶
[00:20.13]可你从不让我追上你
[00:22.43]我希望我也和你一样
[00:24.53]但我知道 我会再次让你进入我的心里 而一旦如此
[00:27.83]我就会痛不欲生 你不是故意的
[00:31.14]我这样安慰自己
[00:33.01]但你为何要这样无情
[00:35.40]我知道你觉得这伤不了我
[00:37.61]可你让我生不如死
[00:39.21]姑娘 最可怕的是
[00:41.92]你沉溺于别人对你的关注
[00:44.38]得寸进尺
[00:46.54]让我独处黑暗中
[00:48.16]有始无终
[00:50.46]姑娘 你为何要这样无情
[00:52.88]好无情
[00:55.12]你为何要这样无情
[00:57.36]好无情
[01:00.45]周一晚上绝不是属于我们的夜晚
[01:02.83]周二晚上不过是再吵一架
[01:04.96]周三 我以为一切都会不一样
[01:07.01]周四来了 依然如此
[01:09.27]周五晚上 我们进城去
[01:11.39]周六 我们应该已经摈弃前嫌
[01:13.60]周日早上到来 你已经离去
[01:15.64]我现在应该明白了这一切
[01:17.93]//
[01:20.05]我现在应该明白了这一切
[01:21.89]但是
[01:25.41]你为何要这样无情
[01:27.29]我知道你觉得这伤不了我
[01:29.46]可你让我生不如死
[01:31.19]姑娘 最可怕的是
[01:33.86]你沉溺于别人对你的关注
[01:36.26]得寸进尺
[01:38.42]让我独处黑暗中
[01:40.09]有始无终
[01:42.55]姑娘 你为何要这样无情
[01:44.99]好无情
[01:46.97]你为何要这样无情
[01:49.27]好无情
[01:51.09]姑娘 你为何这样模棱两可
[01:54.41]又要爱我 又要离开我
[02:00.80]//
[02:03.26]我现在应该明白了这一切
[02:05.20]但是
[02:08.59]你为何要这样无情
[02:10.52]我知道你觉得这伤不了我
[02:12.71]可你让我生不如死
[02:14.39]姑娘 最可怕的是
